english: Friday afternoons are left free for revision .
chinese: 留出星期五下午的时间做复习。

english: We have reviewed the whole text .
You must rub up your grammar. it's not as good as it was .
chinese: 你的语法不如以前那么好了，你必须复习一下。

english: The drawing procedure is reviewed before interpreting this figure .
chinese: 在解释这个图以前，先复习一下画图的方法。

english: In the sections that follow, we shall begin with a review of newton's laws .
chinese: 从下面几节，我们将开始复习牛顿的定律。
复习造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: A succinct review of this problem with an excellent bibliography has recently appeared .
chinese: 关于这个问题的一个简明的复习和一份极好的文献目录最近已发表。

english: Regular review can make our new knowledge permanent
chinese: 定期复习能帮助巩固新知识。

english: Many a student is busy with their lessons
chinese: 许许多多的学生都忙着复习他们的功课。

english: They are reviewing their lessons in the bright light
chinese: 他们在明亮的灯光下复习功课

english: Have ss review the features of street signs
chinese: 复习上节课教授的街头标识物的特性。

english: He went over for two months for passing the exam
chinese: 为了通过考试，他复习了2个月。

english: Regular review can make our new knowledge permannent
chinese: 定期复习能帮助巩固新知识。

english: You had better go over these ancient chinese units
chinese: 大家最好复习一下文言文单元。

english: Shall we go over your english exercises together
chinese: 咱们一起复习你的英语练习好吗？

english: For your homework , review today ' s lesson
chinese: 家庭作业是复习今天讲的课，预习下一课。
